title: ŠAMPON ZA LASE COCO MILK & MACADAMIA, BOTANIC THERAPY, GARNIER, 400ML

ingredient-information.sestavine: 1161774 D - INGREDIENTS: AQUA / WATER, SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE, COCO-BETAINE, GLYCERIN, GLYCOL DISTEARATE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, MACADAMIA INTEGRIFOLIA SEED OIL, PPG-5-CETETH-20, CARBOMER, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, SODIUM ACETATE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, COCOS NUCIFERA FRUIT EXTRACT / COCONUT FRUIT EXTRACT, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL, CITRIC ACID, XANTHAN GUM, POLYQUATERNIUM-10, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, SALICYLIC ACID, LINALOOL, LIMONENE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE (F.I.L C216354/2).
